mean_cn: adj. 狂热的，极感兴趣的，热情的
mean_en: feeling or showing strong excitement about something :filled with or marked by enthusiasm
word_etyma: enthusiast热情者 + ic形容词后缀 → enthusiastic 热情的
sentence: He's always so enthusiastic about video games--he loves them so much.
sentence_trans: 他对电子游戏总是充满热情，他非常喜欢游戏！
